General interface to recurrent neural network models

rnn.Rd

General interface to recurrent neural network models

rnn(
  mode = "regression",
  timesteps = NULL,
  horizon = 1,
  learn_rate = 0.01,
  epochs = 50,
  hidden_units = NULL,
  dropout = NULL,
  batch_size = 32,
  scale = TRUE
)

Arguments

mode

(character) Model mode, default: 'regression'
timesteps

(integer or torchts::timesteps) Number of timesteps to look back
horizon

(integer) Forecast horizon
learn_rate

(numeric or dials::learn_rate) Learning rate
epochs

(integer or dials::epochs) Number of epochs
hidden_units

Number of hidden units
dropout

(logical or dials::dropout) Flag to use dropout
batch_size

(integer) Batch size
scale

(logical) Scale input features

Examples

library(torchts)
library(parsnip)
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
library(rsample)

# Univariate time series
tarnow_temp <-
 weather_pl %>%
 filter(station == "TARNÓW") %>%
 select(date, temp = tmax_daily)

data_split <- initial_time_split(tarnow_temp)

rnn_model <-
   rnn(
     timesteps = 20,
     horizon = 1,
     epochs = 10,
     hidden_units = 32
   )

#> Error in rnn(timesteps = 20, horizon = 1, epochs = 10, hidden_units = 32): nieużywane argumenty (timesteps = 20, horizon = 1)

rnn_model <-
   rnn_model %>%
   fit(temp ~ date, data = training(data_split))

#> Error in fit(., temp ~ date, data = training(data_split)): nie znaleziono obiektu 'rnn_model'
